InstructionData.Title: VAV
InstructionData.Author: onebit
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias GasSensor d0 alias Pump d1 alias Heater d2 alias Return d3
alias presout r0 alias rate r1 alias temperature r2 alias tempout r3 alias VOLUME r4 alias hazard r5 alias pressure r6 alias output r7 alias kp r8 alias setpoint r9 alias pv r10 alias overpres r11 alias temp1 r12 alias temp2 r13 alias temp3 r14
define TICKSPERDAY 2400 define CELLS 25 define LPERCELL 8000 define ACM 0.1 # air change per day define ACDMIN 0.1 define ACDMAX 1 define TOXIC 0.5 define PUMPMIN 4 define SUPPRES 1000 # supply pressure define MAXPRES 125
mul VOLUME CELLS LPERCELL loop: l pressure GasSensor Pressure
l temp1 GasSensor RatioVolatiles l temp2 GasSensor RatioPollutant add temp1 temp1 temp2 # sum(h2, x) mul temp1 temp1 pressure # pp of toxin sge hazard temp1 TOXIC sge temp1 pressure MAXPRES or hazard hazard temp1
l temperature GasSensor Temperature slt temp1 temperature 295.483 s Heater On temp1
select temp1 hazard 0 101.325 s Return Mode 1 s Return PressureInternal 50000 s Return PressureExternal temp1 s Return On 1
move setpoint 101.325 move kp 50 move pv pressure jal calcpid move presout output
move setpoint 296.483 move kp -100 move pv temperature jal calcpid move tempout output #s db Setting tempout max rate presout tempout max rate rate PUMPMIN div temp1 101.325 SUPPRES mul rate temp1 rate select rate hazard 0 rate s db Setting rate s Pump Setting rate #seqz temp1 hazard s Pump On 1
# PV=nRT # n=PV/RT #l temp1 GasSensor Pressure # P #mul temp1 temp1 1000 #mul temp1 temp1 200 # PV #l temp2 GasSensor Temperature # T #mul temp2 temp2 8.314 # RT #div mols temp1 temp2 # n=PV/RT #s db Setting mols yield j loop
calcpid: # input: setpoint kp # output: output sub temp1 setpoint pv # error mul output kp temp1 # kp * error #s db Setting output j ra
